body:
well in my opinion boats rn are really op 
just because there in no fall damage  .
what the point of making a good def if they just can tower up to the limit  bridge to mon and go down with a boat

title: boat should be nerf?

replies.body: I remember when boats were not allowed :/ When was it even allowed...

replies.body: You can use boats again!?!??!??!

I have never used boats I've always used mine carts

if you don't take damage in boats they should be nerfed

replies.body:
Well, you get damage when you hit the ground with them.
It's the same technique you use with minecarts.
And yes it's hard to defend with people coming down with boats, but just one shot is enough to break the boat and let them die.

replies.body:
^ What Rylo said. The simple thing that you can do is just shoot the boat and let them die. It's like leading your target when they're running across a bridge.

Except they're going down.

I've killed many people this way.
